title: Can't submit question from my Pixel 3
content:
I had issues with bluetooth (specifically it WONT turn off). 

I tried to submit a question.. but the menu on my Pixel screen is different from (this) Desktop screen.  Before I can ask a question I must select a Category.. but the menu has no options and I cannot proceed. 

The only option is "Please Select" which I cannot select. 

UGH!!!

I have screenshots. 

I am literally troubleshooting troubleshooting..
